languages.text: "Как и написано в завещании. Так тому и быть! Я прослежу за формальностями и чтобы вы получили все бумаги на собственность".
"As it is written in the will. So be it! I will see to all the formalities and make sure you receive all the deeds to the property."
languages.original_text: "Как и написано в завещании. Так тому и быть! Я прослежу за формальностями и чтобы вы получили все бумаги на собственность".

traits.locale_text: "As it is written in the will. So be it! I will see to all the formalities and make sure you receive all the deeds to the property."
"As it is written in the will. So be it! I will see to all the formalities and make sure you receive all the deeds to the property."
"As it is written in the will. So be it! I will see to all the formalities and make sure you receive all the deeds to the property."
"As it is written in the will. So be it! I will see to all the formalities and make sure you receive all the deeds to the property."
"As it is written in the will. So be it! I will see to all the formalities and make sure you receive all the deeds to the property."

languages.text: “正如遗嘱中要求的那样。那就这么办吧！我会处理好所有的手续，确保你安全收到所有的财产契约。”
languages.original_text: "As it is written in the will. So be it! I will see to all the formalities and make sure you receive all the deeds to the property."

traits.locale_text: “正如遗嘱中要求的那样。那就这么办吧！我会处理好所有的手续，确保你安全收到所有的财产契约。”

languages.text: «Tal y como está escrito en el testamento. ¡Que así sea! Me ocuparé de resolver las formalidades y de que reciba las escrituras correspondientes a la propiedad».
languages.original_text: "As it is written in the will. So be it! I will see to all the formalities and make sure you receive all the deeds to the property."

traits.locale_text: «Tal y como está escrito en el testamento. ¡Que así sea! Me ocuparé de resolver las formalidades y de que reciba las escrituras correspondientes a la propiedad».

languages.text: 「遺言に書かれているとおりですね。では、そのように手配しましょう！財産の証書はすべてあなたに引き渡されるように手続きいたします」
languages.original_text: "As it is written in the will. So be it! I will see to all the formalities and make sure you receive all the deeds to the property."

traits.locale_text: 「遺言に書かれているとおりですね。では、そのように手配しましょう！財産の証書はすべてあなたに引き渡されるように手続きいたします」

languages.text: "Wie es im Testament geschrieben steht. So sei es! Ich werde mich um alle Formalitäten kümmern und Euch sämtliche Besitzurkunden zukommen lassen."
languages.original_text: "As it is written in the will. So be it! I will see to all the formalities and make sure you receive all the deeds to the property."

traits.locale_text: "Wie es im Testament geschrieben steht. So sei es! Ich werde mich um alle Formalitäten kümmern und Euch sämtliche Besitzurkunden zukommen lassen."

languages.text: « Comme il est indiqué dans le testament. Qu'il en soit ainsi ! Je m'occuperai des formalités et veillerai à ce que tous les actes de propriété vous soient transférés. »
languages.original_text: "As it is written in the will. So be it! I will see to all the formalities and make sure you receive all the deeds to the property."

traits.locale_text: « Comme il est indiqué dans le testament. Qu'il en soit ainsi ! Je m'occuperai des formalités et veillerai à ce que tous les actes de propriété vous soient transférés. »

languages.text: "Vasiyetnamede de öyle yazıyor. Karar verildi! Formaliteleri ben halledecek ve tüm malı mülkü devraldığınızdan emin olacağım."
languages.original_text: "As it is written in the will. So be it! I will see to all the formalities and make sure you receive all the deeds to the property."

traits.locale_text: "Vasiyetnamede de öyle yazıyor. Karar verildi! Formaliteleri ben halledeceğim ve tüm mülkiyetleri devraldığınızdan emin olacağım."
